T02D2772:145a-0: @145a * // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs mchod sbyin mang po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2772:145a-1: de nas snying rje chen po can chu gtor gyi
T02D2772:145a-2: mchod sbyin la mngon par dga' bas gang na ri
T02D2772:145a-3: dang thang dang 'bab chu dang ne'u gsing dang /
T02D2772:145a-4: lha khang dang phug la sogs pa ci rigs pa'i
T02D2772:145a-5: gnas su yo byad phun sum tshogs par byas nas
T02D2772:145a-6: bde ba'i yid dang ldan pas 'dug ste /
T02D2772:145a-7: gsum la skyabs su song nas brtsams te //
T02D2772:145a-8: byang chub mchog tu sems gzung bar //
T02D2772:145a-9: byams sogs tshangs pa'i gnas bcas pas //
T02D2772:145a-10: nges bar byas te cho ga brtsam //
T02D2772:145a-11: thams cad stong pa nyid dbyings las //
T02D2772:145a-12: padma zla dbus sa bon mtshan //
T02D2772:145a-13: yongs gyur sbyor bas lha mchog bskyed //
T02D2772:145a-14: phyag rgya sngags kyis yongs su bcing //
T02D2772:145a-15: rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba //
T02D2772:145a-16: gnyis brkyang gung mo mdzub gnyis mdud //
T02D2772:145a-17: mthe bong rdo rje bsten sbyar la //
T02D2772:145a-18: spyi gtsug steng du gsal gzhag ste /
T02D2772:145a-19: na ma:sa manta buddha n'am badzra aushn'i sha h'um h'um /
T02D2772:145a-20: zhes bya bas gtsug tor gsal bar bya'o //
T02D2772:145a-21: rdo rje thal mo gnyis sbyar las //
T02D2772:145a-22: gung mo gnyis brkyang srin lag mdzub //
T02D2772:145a-23: rtse sbyar phan tshun khyud bskor nas //
T02D2772:145a-24: gtsug tor steng du gsal byas nas //
T02D2772:145a-25: aom a'a: hr'i:badzra aa mri te pasth'i ti h'um h'um /
T02D2772:145a-26: zhes bya bas 'od dpag med kyi cod pan bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2772:145a-27: klu mchog chos 'chad las skyes pa //
T02D2772:145a-28: gung mo dang ni mthe bong gnyis //
T02D2772:145a-29: gshibs brkyang rtse mo lhan cig pa //
T02D2772:145a-30: dmigs la nye bar btud nas ni //
T02D2772:145a-31: aom a'a:hr'i:badzra dzny'a na tsakshu pra sa ka sa h'um /
T02D2772:145a-32: zhes bya bas ye shes kyi sbyan dang ldan pas gsal bar bya'o //
T02D2772:145a-33: lag gnyis mnyam pa'i thal sbyar bas //
T02D2772:145a-34: mdzub gnyis gung mo la mdud cing //
T02D2772:145a-35: mtheb gnyis gung mo la btud nas //
T02D2772:145a-36: lus kun kun tu bskor nyul bas //
T02D2772:145a-37: aom a'a:hr'i:badzra nam badzra tsakra bha ba wa ka pa te h'um /
T02D2772:145a-38: zhes bya bas rdo rje zhub kyi go bgo bar bya'o //
T02D2772:145a-40: rnam dag chos nyid rgya chen nam mkha' mdzod dang bdud rtsi thab sbyor dang /
T02D2772:145a-41: shugs chen skar mda' dbang du byed bshad rgyal ba spyan ras gzigs dbang rgya //
T02D2772:145a-42: sngags bcas grangs kyi dri dral bsam yas bdud rtsi'i mtsho chen sprin 'khrigs dang //
T02D2772:145b-0: dpag med lus kyis phun @145b tshogs mchod sprul ma lus ci rigs dgos dgur mchod //
T02D2772:145b-1: aom sva bh'a wa bi shuddha:sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a ba bi shuddho nya\ham /
T02D2772:145b-2: nam: sarba ta th'a ga te bhyo /
T02D2772:145b-3: bi shva mu khe bhya:sarba tatkhamautga te spha ra na hi mam ga ga na kham sv'a h'a /
T02D2772:145b-4: aom aa mram ta kunda li ha na ha na h'um /
T02D2772:145b-5: nam:sarba ta th'a ga ta aa ba lo ki te /
T02D2772:145b-7: aom dzny'a na aa ba lo ki te sa manta
T02D2772:145b-8: spha ra na ra smi bha b'a sa ma ya
T02D2772:145b-9: ma h'a ma ni du ru hri da ya dza
T02D2772:145b-10: la ni h'um / na ma:sa manta buddh'a n'am gra
T02D2772:145b-11: ha shva ri pra bh'a ba dzo ti ma h'a
T02D2772:145b-13: nam:sarba ta th'a ga te ma h'a k'a ru ni
T02D2772:145b-14: k'a ya sva ra shr'i aa ba lo ki te
T02D2772:145b-15: ma h'a aa dhishth'a na dzva la n'a n'a p'u
T02D2772:145b-16: dza me gha spha ra na h'um /
T02D2772:145b-17: pam las pad snod rgya chen ni //
T02D2772:145b-18: 'bru gsum las gyur sna tshogs bcud //
T02D2772:145b-19: zab cing rgya che'i sngags phyag rgyas //
T02D2772:145b-20: byin brlabs de steng sman shing bskyed //
T02D2772:145b-21: aa dang ka sogs las grub pa //
T02D2772:145b-22: grub pa nyi shu sogs rdzas kyis //
T02D2772:145b-23: legs spras dam tshigs gtor ma la //
T02D2772:145b-24: ye shes bstims la ji bzhin mchod //
T02D2772:145b-25: dpal ldan thugs rje che stobs mthus //
T02D2772:145b-26: sri zhu yon tan phan 'dogs dang //
T02D2772:145b-27: snying rje'i gnas gyur ltos chags mgron //
T02D2772:145b-28: tshim byed mchod sbyin 'di rab bsngags //
